meaningMnemonic: You're stuck in <radical>prison</radical> with nothing but a <radical>spoon</radical>, and the <kanji>smell</kanji> in here is so bad you’re using the prison spoon to waft it outside as best you can.
readingMnemonic: You can’t believe how awful these <kanji>smell</kanji>s are. You’re new in prison, so you call them all <reading>neo</reading>-smells (にお). They're neo, they're new to you.
